profile_positions.description:
1. Managed the roadmap for new initiatives around data and insights based on business impact.
2. Proactively developed reports during key promotional events that can bring insightful findings that are actionable within Performance Marketing.
3. Continuously optimized the way of working to drive operational efficiency.
4. Supported the Director with traffic forecast on a quarterly basis, with continuous development to improve accuracy to understand the traffic levers.
5. Held the responsibility of governance of data hygiene within Google Analytics 360 and 4, working in collaboration with the Analytics & Insight team.

profile_positions.description:
1) Creating strategies using data and insights to drive all teams to work cohesively, optimizing each to
maximize revenue.
2) Collaborating with cross-functional team members to come up with actionable, high-impact insights
across product lines and functions.
3) Developing and implementing regular reporting of key performance metrics including attainment, funnel analysis, and pipeline management along with sales performance metrics.
4) Converting unstructured (or ambiguous) data into usable data sets that can be analyzed to
extract insights and improve business processes.

2) Analysing business prospects and liaison between employees and prospects to close business deals.
3) Arriving at business-relevant conclusions by analyzing data to achieve the same. 
4) Working closely with the product Solutions Engineering team to understand and categorize their required metrics to derive a more meaningful outcome to various business deals
profile_positions.title: Business Intelligence Analyst - Enterprise Analytics

profile_positions.description:
1) Establishing productive, professional relationships with key personnel in assigned customer accounts.
2) Coordinating the involvement of company personnel, including support, service, and management resources, in order to meet account performance objectives and customers’ expectations.
3) Meeting assigned targets for profitable sales volume and strategic objectives (including cross-selling of other products from the company) in assigned accounts.
4) Proactively leading a joint company-strategic account planning process that develops mutual performance objectives, financial targets, and critical milestones for a monthly and annual period.
5) Leading solution development efforts that best address customer needs while coordinating the involvement of all necessary company personnel.

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.description:
1) Trained as the first woman shift leader in the company
2) Involved in patented product adjustments in the department
3) Trained in Thin film deposition using magnetron sputtering technology.
4) Adjustment of solar controlled and low emissivity films and their usage with their processing.
5) Trained in LAB based color coordinate system for the thin film adjustment for aesthetics.
6) Trained on the importance of G value and solar factor for the performance of thin films
7) Played a major part in plant safety SMAT and 5S.
8) Trained in maintaining the EN standards in quality
9) Done a Major Kaizen project which is based on the Noise reduction in Dry air compressors

volunteer_experiences.description: Blog on 'With a cause' which highlighted the issues of resources which are polluted in India and what are the adverse effects including some like 'Cancer train in Punjab'

A common Tamil based education portal on topics on the common issues in the world and the people and places which are being talked about in the  world till date including the historical character of 'Harisingh Nalva' and also about the unsung heroes who helped us in the battles in redeeming India from the invaders. The blog was titled 'Daily seithigal'
